quote: I Don'T Like That Man. I Must Get To Know Him Better.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: It Is Easier To Stay Out Than Get Out.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I'm so fast that last night I turned off the light switch in my hotel room and was in bed before the room was dark.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Everything That We See Is A Shadow Cast By That Which We Do Not See.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
